animation_event.description: [string]The animation event to play when entering this range.

exit_animation_event.description: [string]The animation event to play when leaving this range.

min_speed.description: Min speed required to enter this range.

focused.description: [bool]Focused locomotion means that the character can focus in on a position while moving towards another position, meaning it can strafe.

linear_rotation_override_frames.description: The duration in frames that we linearly blend rotation so that we can counter animate to cover up the unit rotation in speed range transitions. A value of -1 means no rotation override, 0 is instant and any number above that is the rotation duration in frames.
